channel.title: About saving .java file's
channel.description: Ok, before i start i would like to state that yes, i am a newb at this stuff, but please have patience. I know how frusterating leechers can be, even if you think about the fact that you were one once. I've figured out where i need to put new commands in (in the .java file). But when i click save (and restart server) the new commands won't take place. I'm think i need to compile them some way? I've read the guides and i have downloaded JDK 6 update 2.. however when i try running the compiler it say's i need JDK 5.0 or 6.0 or the updated versions of those. And one last question, the server use's the .class files not the .java file's to run the game right? Thanks for your time :)

item.title: About saving .java file's
item.dc:creator: @Aero_Mist Aero Mist
item.description:
@Aero_Mist wrote:

Thank you very much jungledude! very well explained will edit after i try

EDIT: Work’s perfectlly, thanks jungledude!

Read full topic

item.title: About saving .java file's
item.dc:creator: @jungledude jungledude
item.description:
@jungledude wrote:

It is because the newest JDK has a different file name then the old one so Tharoks compiler is outdated use this for a compiler (it has a compiler and run server all together)

@echo off
Title ZyberScape Compiler
color 03
echo Compiling...
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.1\bin\javac" *.java -nowarn *.java
color 03
echo Complete!
pause
cls
Title ZyberScape Server 
runNoIP.exe
set java="C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe"
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server

I’m to lazy to take out my custom stuff so uhhh you can take it out.

[hr]
Edit -

If that dose not work go to My Computer>>C>>Program Files>>Java and then look for a file in there named JDK(something) and rename it to JDK6. Then use this compiler.

@echo off
Title ZyberScape Compiler
color 03
echo Compiling…
“C:\Program Files\Java\JDK6\bin\javac” *.java -nowarn *.java
color 03
echo Complete!
pause
cls
Title ZyberScape Server
runNoIP.exe
set java=“C:\Program Files\Java\JDK6\bin\java.exe”
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server

Read full topic

item.title: About saving .java file's
item.dc:creator: @Aero_Mist Aero Mist
item.description:
@Aero_Mist wrote:

Did you read the whole post? I tried to compile but it says that you need JDK version 5.0 or 6.0 or updated versions of them. I have version 6 update 2, as the frugooscape client works (If i didn’t have JDK it wouldn’t right?) Maybe its that the compiler im using isn’t for the update 2 version? Thanks anyways

Read full topic
